corpus = """<s> I am Jack </s> <s> Jack I am </s> <s> Jack I like </s> <s> Jack I do like </s> <s> do I like Jack </s>"""
print(round(unigram_probability(corpus, "Jack"),4))

corpus = """<s> I am Jack </s> <s> Jack I am </s> <s> Jack I like </s> <s> Jack I do like </s> <s> do I like Jack </s>"""
print(round(unigram_probability(corpus, "like"),4))

corpus = """<s> the quick brown fox </s> <s> jumps over the lazy dog </s>"""
